players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Let's all work together today to figure out who the detective is. We need to gather information and eliminate suspects."
Diana: "Let's focus on gathering information about everyone, and I'll try to figure out who the mafioso is. We should also keep an eye on Alice since they were found out last night."
